TopicTitle: What should I do in my next video.

Articles.Content:
Hi, I'm low on ideas and am wondering what you think I should do in my next video? Please tell me down below in the comments.

Here's a link to my channel if you want to check it out: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMahyasjKNXy3hZU3IxPsUA
Dock a plane to a rocket in mid-air and go to orbit?
Moved to the subforum for player-made vids.

Catch an astroid (if you can), then create a decently sized ship using the astroid as the starting point, and when you run out of fuel, extract Ore from the astroid and convert it into Liquid Fuel/Oxidiser, giving you a refuelable ship.

Edited February 13, 2016 by Fred Cop
